text.tspan: Linda is 31 years old, single, outspoken, and very bright. She majored in philosophy.
As a student, she was deeply concerned with issues of discrimination and social justice,
and also participated in anti-nuclear demonstrations.
2. Linda is a bank teller and is active in the feminist movement.
Suppose Roger Federer reaches the Wimbledon finals next year.
Please rank order the following outcomes from most to least likely.
2. Federer will lose the first set
3. Federer will lose the first set but win the match
4. Federer will win the first set but lose the match
[Use the numbers in order to complete the task]
You are asked to select three cards from a standard 52-card deck.
1. One that contains the Queen of Hearts.
2. One that contains the Queen of Hearts, the Queen of Spades, and the Queen of Diamonds.
